name: pledge with no reward
info: Choose to support us without a reward if you simply believe in our project. As a backer, you will be signed up to receive product updates via email.

name: Bamboo Stand
info: You get an ergonomic stand made of nautral bamboo. You've helped us launch our promotional campaign, and you'll be added to a special Backer member list.

name: Black Edition Stand
info: You get a Black Special Edition computer stand and a personal thank you note. You'll be added to our Backer member list. Shipping is included.

name: Mahogany Special Edition
info: You get two Special Edition Mahogany stand, a Backer T-Shirt, and a personal thank you. You will be added to our Backer member list. Shipping is included.
